sections.heading: to 12-255t. - Telecommunications service company tax.
sections.text:
Sections 12-255a to 12-255t, inclusive, are repealed effective May 9, 1991, and applicable to taxable years of taxpayers commencing on or after January 1, 1991.

(P.A. 86-410, S. 1â€“19, 28; P.A. 88-11; 88-230, S. 1, 12; 88-337, S. 2, 5; P.A. 89-251, S. 10, 203; 89-343, S. 7, 17; P.A. 90-98, S. 1, 2; P.A. 91-82, S. 4, 5.)
